Project1.name: Escape NYC
Project1.description: A front-end web app that displays the cheapest flights to the destination defined by the search input as well as current weather conditions in NYC in the side menu widget.
Project1.technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, third party APIs, Surge

Project2.name: My Recipe Book
Project2.description: A full-stack web app demonstrating full CRUD functionality. The user can create an account, add/edit/delete recipes, and view recipes created by other users.
Project2.technologies: CSS, React, Mongoose, MongoDB, Express, bcrypt, JWT, MongoDB Atlas, Heroku, Surge

Project3.name: Al Di La Trattoria
Project3.description: A front-end website for a Brooklyn-based Italian restaurant. The project is made in collaboration with the UX team.

Project4.name: Fresh Cucumbers
Project4.description: A full-stack web app demonstrating full CRUD functionality. The user can create an account, add/edit/delete movie reviews, and view the reviews created by other users.
Project4.technologies: CSS, React, React Router, Ruby on Rails, bcrypt, JWT, Heroku, Surge
